channel.title: Project Clarent
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2aexsah.png[/img] ^^ note: banner created by our gfx designer: 9xp_12 [code=java] Coders: Mock Pro & RandQm Base: Delta [/code] [u]Hey guys! new development starting here! for the next few months RandQm and I will be working on a base called "Project Clarent" yes, this is a delta base, and for all of you PI fans, and Delta haters, we are here to show you how good delta can be, make sure you stay updated and leave your comments below! , if you would like to see something in this server, please make sure you mention it! WE REALLY EXPECT SOMETHING OF THIS SERVER![/u] [b]Goals:[/b] Green = Done Orange = In progress Red = Not started
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042726/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img] [b]Combat[/b]
- NPC Clipping - Fully working specials - correct attack emotes
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043125/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img] [b]Magic[/b]
- Working ancient spells - Autocasting - All spells working
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043145/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img] [b]Ranging[/b]
- Just descent ranging
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215022527/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]
- All bones
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044857/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
- Basic mining - full mining - All rocks - Full mining Guild - Essence mining - perfect mining! W00T
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044858/runescape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img][b] Smithing[/b]
- All bars can be smith and smelted
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img][b] Fishing[/b]
- All fish - Right animations
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043728/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]
- at least 30 cookable items, and all the fish - Burning & Gauntlets
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img] [b]Woodcutting[/b]
- Basic woodcutting - All trees working - Correct axe chopping emote - Tree stumps & respawning - Random bird nests
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img] [b]Firemaking[/b]
- Simple firemaking - Clipped - All logs lightable (even mohogany and teak.. ect. xD
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101104013322/runescape/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img] [b]Agility[/b]
- Gnome course - Another high level course, not decided which one yet.
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101017212730/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img] [b]Herblore[/b]
- Basic Herblore - Herblore Cleaning - Perfect potsmaking
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img] [b]thieving[/b]
- Npc thieving with stunning - All stalls with correct items
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053743/runescape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img] [b]Crafting[/b]
- Hide tanning + crafting - All uncuts
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053740/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img] [b]Runecrafting[/b]
- All altars - Multiple runes - Working pouches
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img] [b]Fletching[/b]
- Interfaces - All logs fletchable - Attaching strings - Fletching emote - Arrow shafting
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103032422/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img] [b]Slayer[/b]
- Simple Slayer system - Slayertask reseting
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img] [b]Farming[/b]
- basic farming system - All seeds working - Correct tools required - atleast 20 different seeds
[img]http://t3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR9y0hvH7z76zUvuH9352DqYH6TJOyGyFwdi--3e_6d5zE2f-DdHZK7tQ[/img] [b]Quests[/b]
- Tutorial Island! - All free quests completed - Lost City
[img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/4259/frtp.png[/img] [b]Hidden[/b] - Packaging - Removing customs - Godsword making with smithing req - SkillCape emotes
here are some updates, added custom starter package, 2 choices an ip :p one on each account. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gwhGCbF1JbE&feature=player_embedded [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/didu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/skiller2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/melee1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/melee2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/range1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/range2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/magic1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/magic2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/herblore1-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/herblore2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/herblore3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/herblore4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/herblore5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/herblore6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/16873507.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/mining2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1211.photobucket.com/albums/cc426/Project_clarent/mining3.png[/img]

item.title: Project Clarent
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:83, topic:424694”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=527358.msg3866478#msg3866478 date=1325037718]

Looks like things are coming along well here, great job boys.

going slow now with the holidays & ty

This is the only Delta project I have hope for other than my own<3 you better finish it

I certainly will, actually we were going alpha already with christmas,
but I decided to start cleaning up delta and improving as much as my java knowledge can let me do.
I will post some media in a few minutes

EDIT
Here is a few snippets media:




Im currently also working on delta’s horrible conventions
[/quote]
Are you making all your classes static? (I noticed the PotionHandler.method();, static access of the class)

If you are, wouldn’t it be easier to use a setter and getter?[/quote]

I read they can damage your code’s maintainability, so I chose to use statics
though this is currently only for my potion classes, there’s currently still a way to much code going through the client class

Read full topic

but I decided to start cleaning up delta and improving as much as my java knowledge can let me do.

Im currently also working on delta’s horrible conventions[/quote]

item.title: Project Clarent
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:73, topic:424694”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=527358.msg3856047#msg3856047 date=1324351508]
Some updates: (Media and more updates will be added soon)

[b]- Better packaging

  • Almost perfect mining with rocks going empty (no gems and don’t feel like adding these shitty bitches to)
  • Basic woodcutting with stumps (only normal trees atm)
  • Stall thieving (all stalls on whole the rs world map are supported) + stalls going empty
  • Started NPC thieving with stunning
  • Christmas event in progress
  • 1 full quest added
  • playertalk supported
  • Added full runecrafting with multiple rune making supported + all altars
  • Added smithing frames[/b]
    [/quote]some nice updates right there[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Project Clarent
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Owner Fritz, post:66, topic:424694”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=527358.msg3844042#msg3844042 date=1323475100]

Honestly don’t see the point in doing this one a Delta when Project Insanity has this/most is released for it. I’m not trying to say PI is pro, and you that should use it, I just don’t see the point in doing it on a Delta, sorry.

Good luck though.

Stability, and creativity.

Delta is JUST as shitty, if not shittier stability wise. + None of this is creative hence: [quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=527358.msg3844025#msg3844025 date=1323474516]
Project Insanity has this/most is released

Meaning, tons of servers have it.
[/quote]

no you don’t have a perfect beginner tutorial

this is the main points we want to do,
in the meanwhile we will be working out unique ideas, which no server has;


[/quote]

‘Unique ideas’? What are you smoking. Tutorial Island isn’t unique and plenty of servers have it perfect.[/quote]

In what part did I say that the tutorial island is the unique idea?
We will generally add some unique things, doesn’t mean that everything we show off is unique,

Read full topic
